A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Was this movie written for (or perhaps\, by) eight year old children?  In Rogue One\, it felt like there were real consequences.  Now with Last Jedi\, we're back to hootin and hollerin in the midst of battle like we're having the time of our lives.  Seriously\, we're approaching little Ani vs the Trade Federation territory.  I know you have toys and merchandise to push\, Rian Johnson\, but take a tip from Gareth Edwards: adults watch Star Wars\, too.
